author: tmiychao
content:
<@&857649635274915900> One week till the start of the cohort! 

We will first meet on <t:1750086000:F> (3PM UTC) for the first call with introduction to cohort + meet and greet fellows. You already received a calendar invite, for everyone else, you can subscribe to this calendar https://calendar.google.com/calendar/u/0?cid=Y19lMzNkMzEyYWM4NDI4YzNjNTU3NzliY2ViYmQ1MWNiMTg5NDMxNWEzOTA1NmNkMGNiYzY2ZDlmN2M5YmRkODE5QGdyb3VwLmNhbGVuZGFyLmdvb2dsZS5jb20

Before the cohort starts, please follow the checklist to prepare https://www.notion.so/efdn/Getting-ready-for-EPF6-206d989555418055a316c49163806e7a.
And while you are at it, you can share your preliminary studies in the repo already. This and everything before the cohort starts is week 0 https://github.com/eth-protocol-fellows/cohort-six/blob/master/development-updates.md#phase-1-discovery

author: joshd4078
content: Please make sure that you are spending some time trying to figure out the answers to your questions before you ask them. Many of the questions you ask here (and during ACD calls) are easily answered by a little bit of searching.
